lead_paragraph: Alex Velez, 21, was given 18 years to life in prison for the fatal attack, during which Mr. Velez and five others made homophobic remarks, the authorities said.

headline.print_headline: Prison for 4th Man in Fatal Beating of L.I. Teenager
headline.main: 4th Man Gets Prison in Killing of Long Island Teenager in 2011

snippet: Alex Velez, 21, was given 18 years to life in prison for the fatal attack, during which Mr. Velez and five others made homophobic remarks, the authorities said.
abstract: Alex Velez of Queens, who pleaded guilty in April to first-degree manslaughter charges, is sentenced to 18 years to life in prison for 2011 group assault in Queens that took life of Anthony Collao.
